name: YRek Lost In Portals
summary: An Action-Adventure First Person Shooter, with big boss fights encounter and dungeon exploration. Fps inspired by the old Fps of the 1990s, Getting ammo, weapons, and health to survive the Adventure against enemy foes is the game about.

name: Yrsa Major
summary: A healing romance between a powerful woman and a gentle water spirit.

name: Yrkkey's Paradise
summary: A raccoon builds a computer and enters cyberspace.

name: Yrminsul
